sqlMap.insert:
insert into t_dict (
dict_code
dict_name
super_dict_code
sib_order
leaf_flag
maint_flag
dict_type
dict_simplepin
dict_allpin
dict_itemtablename
dict_versionid
dict_id
) values (
#dict_code#
#dict_name#
#super_dict_code#
#sib_order#
#leaf_flag#
#maint_flag#
#dict_type#
#dict_simplepin#
#dict_allpin#
#dict_itemtablename#
#dict_versionid#
#dict_id#
)
sqlMap.update:
update t_dict a set dict_code=dict_code
dict_name=#dict_name#
super_dict_code=#super_dict_code#
sib_order=#sib_order#
leaf_flag=#leaf_flag#
maint_flag=#maint_flag#
dict_type=#dict_type#
dict_simplepin=#dict_simplepin#
dict_allpin=#dict_allpin#
dict_itemtablename=#dict_itemtablename#
dict_versionid=#dict_versionid#
dict_id=#dict_id#
where 1=1
sqlMap.select:
select x.* from ( select rownum rowno,z.* from (select a.dict_code dict_code,a.dict_name dict_name,a.super_dict_code super_dict_code,a.sib_order sib_order,a.leaf_flag leaf_flag,a.maint_flag maint_flag,a.dict_type dict_type,a.dict_simplepin dict_simplepin,a.dict_allpin dict_allpin,a.dict_itemtablename dict_itemtablename,a.dict_versionid dict_versionid,a.dict_id dict_id from t_dict a where 1=1
(upper(a.dict_simplepin) like upper('$query_simplepin$')||'%' or lower(a.dict_allpin) like lower('$query_simplepin$')||'%' or a.dict_code like '$query_simplepin$%' or a.dict_name like '%$query_simplepin$%')
a.dict_name like '%$dict_name$%'
a.super_dict_code=#super_dict_code#
a.dict_type=#dict_type#
a.dict_versionid=#dict_versionid#
order by $pageSort$) z) x where rowno >$beginRow$ and rowno <= $endRow$

select count(1) a from t_dict a where 1=1
(upper(a.dict_simplepin) like upper('$query_simplepin$')||'%' or lower(a.dict_allpin) like lower('$query_simplepin$')||'%' or a.dict_code like '$query_simplepin$%' or a.dict_name like '%$query_simplepin$%')
a.dict_name like '%$dict_name$%'
a.super_dict_code=#super_dict_code#
a.dict_type=#dict_type#
a.dict_versionid=#dict_versionid#

select a.dict_code dict_code,a.dict_name dict_name,a.super_dict_code super_dict_code,a.sib_order sib_order,a.leaf_flag leaf_flag,a.maint_flag maint_flag,a.dict_type dict_type,a.dict_simplepin dict_simplepin,a.dict_allpin dict_allpin,a.dict_itemtablename dict_itemtablename,a.dict_versionid dict_versionid,a.dict_id dict_id from t_dict a where 1=1
a.dict_code in ($kongjianDicts$)
( a.dict_name like '%$query_simplepin$%'or a.dict_code = #query_simplepin#)
order by a.dict_code

select a.dict_code dict_code,a.dict_name dict_name,a.super_dict_code super_dict_code,a.sib_order sib_order,a.leaf_flag leaf_flag,a.maint_flag maint_flag,a.dict_type dict_type,a.dict_simplepin dict_simplepin,a.dict_allpin dict_allpin,a.dict_itemtablename dict_itemtablename,a.dict_versionid dict_versionid,a.dict_id dict_id from t_dict a where 1=1
order by a.dict_code

select a.dict_code dict_code,a.dict_name dict_name,a.super_dict_code super_dict_code,a.sib_order sib_order,a.leaf_flag leaf_flag,a.maint_flag maint_flag,a.dict_type dict_type,a.dict_simplepin dict_simplepin,a.dict_allpin dict_allpin,a.dict_itemtablename dict_itemtablename,a.dict_versionid dict_versionid,a.dict_id dict_id from t_dict a
a.maint_flag = '$maint_flag$'
a.dict_code in ('dm_mz','dm_gj(lgy)','dm_xzqh')
order by sib_order

select a.dict_code dict_code,a.dict_name dict_name,a.super_dict_code super_dict_code,a.sib_order sib_order,a.leaf_flag leaf_flag,a.maint_flag maint_flag,a.dict_type dict_type,a.dict_simplepin dict_simplepin,a.dict_allpin dict_allpin,a.dict_itemtablename dict_itemtablename,a.dict_versionid dict_versionid,a.dict_id dict_id from t_dict a where a.super_dict_code= #dict_code#
